alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Acluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 121 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 12 miles east of Schellbourne, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schellbourne, Lages Junction, Cherry Creek and Tippets Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
